title: Hercules and Love Affair Share New Song Featuring the Horrors’ Faris Badwan: Listen
text:
Hercules and Love Affair Share New Song Featuring the Horrors’ Faris Badwan: Listen “Controller” is from the project’s forthcoming album Photo by Burak Cingi/Redferns via Getty Images 
Hercules and Love Affair —the dance music project conceived by DJ and producer Andy Butler—have shared a new song with the Horrors ’ Faris Badwan. It’s called “Controller,” and it’s out now on Big Beat. Stream it below (via The Fader ). The song is from Hercules and Love Affair’s forthcoming album, which doesn’t have a release date yet. “The new album is a lot about spirituality,” Butler told The Fader . “Faris was happy to engage with that.” Hercules and Love Affair’s last album was 2014’s The Feast of the Broken Heart .
